data.text: @GraceHume10 Hi there! Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

data.text: @RamblinWalker It's a third party service, so you need to ask for the refund directly from the company providing the shuttle buses.

@cariboukoko @JackLi68613009 Hi, sorry to hear you've been waiting so long. Please give us a call on our assistance line (local rates) and our colleagues can help right away. Numbers are here: https://t.co/3TxHxhckDD. Another option is to send us an official claim here: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV

data.text: @JackLi68613009 Hi Jack. If your flight was cancelled by us then you're eligible for 100% cash refund or 120% credit refund as well as free rebooking. If you need help with any of this then please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

data.text: @moiraeyres Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.
